text: Neomegamelanus is a genus of delphacid planthoppers in the family Delphacidae. There are about five described species in Neomegamelanus. ==Species== * Neomegamelanus elongatus (Ball, 1905) * Neomegamelanus graminicola (Muir, 1928) * Neomegamelanus lautus (Metcalf, 1923) * Neomegamelanus penilautus McDermott, 1952 * Neomegamelanus spartini (Osborn, 1905) ==References== ==Further reading== * ==External links== * Category:Auchenorrhyncha genera Category:Delphacinae
title: Neomegamelanus
